channel.title: Dirb on pentest notes
channel.description: Recent content in Dirb on pentest notes

item.title: WWW dir scan
item.description: dirb -h cewl seclists gobuster -u http://10.10.10.111:1880 -w /usr/share/wordlists/dirbuster/directory-list-2.3-medium.txt gobuster -u http://10.10.10.111:9999/backup -w /usr/share/wordlists/dirbuster/directory-list-2.3-medium.txt #with -x -m it will be search txt,html gobuster -u http://10.10.10.111/dir -w /usr/share/seclists/Discovery/Web-Content/common.txt -x -m gobuster -u http://10.10.10.111/dir -w /usr/share/seclists/Discovery/Web-Content/common.txt -x html #vhost enum nmap –script http-vhosts -p 80,443 10.10.10.113 git clone https://github.com/jobertabma/virtual-host-discovery ruby scan.rb --ip=10.10.10.1 --host=domein.ltd -w /usr/share/seclists/Discovery/DNS/subdomains-top1mil-20000.txt
